description.narrative: Financial Resources and Stewardship, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Effective and efficient programme management and operational support to achieve an optimum level of programme delivery

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Efficient and effective management of Financial Resources for Operations Sections | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/12/2015

title.narrative: Strengthening field Office Support and support the management of risks related to finance and Administration by: a) Ensuring compliance across offices by conducting PEER review/assist missions in all Field Offices and b) Ensuring sustainability of previous PEER Review missions by performing compliance visits to ensure sustainability of previous recommendations. Enhance the harmonization of business processes during network meetings.

actual.value: 2015:As part of business simplification process, Travel to Field(T2F) was rolled out 1.T2F implemented in Kolkata, Mumbai, Jaipur and Raipur office and Sections in Delhi- Admn & Finance, Resource Mobilsation , IT. Further T2F training was Bhubaneswar, Hyderabad office and HR and Supply Section in Delhi

title.narrative: Effective management of financial resources: (a) quarterly cash forecasting ensuring maintenance of not more than 25% liquidity levels (b) Enhance budget and financial oversight of funds deployed ensuring annual utilisation rates of not less than 96% of allocated budgets.

target.value: 2017:a) At least 10 months per annum below 25% threshhold, (b) Annual Utilisation Rates of at least 96%

actual.value: 2015:Conducted risk informed peer reviews. 6 Offices were identified for reviewed based on risk identified risks in 2015. PEER reviews supported application of financial and administrative management policy, procedures and systems are risk informed. Guwahati, Kolkata, Bhopal, Raipur, Jaipur, Gandhinagar

title.narrative: Increase Efficiency and Effectiveness in Administrative and Finance Services by reviewing at least 2 areas annually for simplification of business processes and increase efficiency and effectiveness and formulate the related work processes.

actual.value: 2015:Rolling quarterly cash forecast are maintained and monitored closely to ensure adequate levels of liquidity. Ensured Regional benchmarks for optimization of funds were adheredBudget utilization was effectively managed to achieve target 100% utilization of Support Budget in 2015.
